title: Workshop on Applying Lesson Study for Teacher Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: For undergraduate students in education departments or teaching certification programs, includes simulation activities for designing and executing actual classroom lessons, conducted through online discussions, offline collaboration, and feedback sessions

learning_goals: Participants can improve instructional design by applying the four stages of Lesson Study (planning-implementation-observation-reflection)
Participants can collaborate with peers to develop and implement lesson plans that consider students' learning outcomes.

Participants can record the PCK development process with five or more concrete examples in a Reflective Journal based on at least three class implementations and observations over two weeks, incorporate two or more peer feedbacks, and produce a final PCK reflection report
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
